title: Linux killall Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux killall command, learn how to kill processes by name or user, and gain practical experience with real-world examples.

meta.title: Linux killall Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux killall command, learn how to kill processes by name or user, and gain practical experience with real-world examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, killall, process management, process termination, process identification, user management

verify.name: Verify killall command usage
verify.hint: Ensure that you can use the `killall` command to kill processes owned by the `labex` user.

verify.name: Verify killing processes by name
verify.hint: Ensure that you can use the `killall` command to kill processes by name, and that the processes are no longer running after the command is executed.

verify.name: Verify killing processes by user
verify.hint: Ensure that you can use the `killall` command with the `-u` option to kill all processes owned by the `labex` user, and that the processes are no longer running after the command is executed.
